text:
Hey parents!!! Good evening.
Can you please send your child folder tomorrow! I need to check your child reading log! I left some of them at school today...
the first quarter due day is October 30th by that time they need at least 36 books.
I also want to thanks micah's mom! Thank you so much for coming today and read to the kids! ğŸ’•
Thank you!
See you guys tomorrow! ğŸ’•
